name: Initial M: Portrait of Lactantius
description: Initial M: Portrait of Lactantius; Ser Ricciardo di Nanni (Italian, active 1449 - 1480); Florence, Tuscany, Italy; about 1456; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with red morocco; Leaf: 32.9 × 22.1 cm (12 15/16 × 8 11/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XI 1, fol. 2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Initial M: Portrait of Lactantius
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with red morocco
